codeSystems.name: USCoreClinicalNoteType
codeSystems.title: US Core Clinical Note Type
codeSystems.description: The US Core Clinical Note Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of types supported for fetching and storing clinical notes.

codeSystems.name: USCoreClinicalResultObservationCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Clinical Result Observation Category
codeSystems.description: Used to classify the context of clinical result observations.

codeSystems.name: USCoreConditionCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Condition Codes
codeSystems.description: This describes the problem. Diagnosis/Problem List is broadly defined as a series of brief statements that catalog a patient's medical, nursing, dental, social, preventative and psychiatric events and issues that are relevant to that patient's healthcare (e.g., signs, symptoms, and defined conditions). ICD-10 is appropriate for Diagnosis information, and ICD-9 for historical information.

codeSystems.name: USCoreConditionCodesCurrent
codeSystems.title: US Core Condition Codes Current
codeSystems.description: This valueset is defined the same as the [US Core Condition Codes](ValueSet-us-core-condition-code.html) value set except it excludes ICD-9-CM codes. It us used for encoding newly recorded, non-legacy problem list items, health concerns and diagnosis using SNOMED CT and ICD-10-CM per USCDI requirements.

codeSystems.name: USCoreDiagnosticReportCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Diagnostic Report Category Codes
codeSystems.description: The US Core Diagnostic Report Category Value Set is a 'starter set' of categories supported for fetching and Diagnostic Reports and notes.

codeSystems.name: USCoreNonLaboratoryCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Non Laboratory Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes All LOINC codes defined as type "clinical," therefore excluding laboratory tests, survey instruments, and claims documents. This includes observables such as vital signs, hemodynamics, intake/output, EKG, obstetric ultrasound, and cardiac echo, and includes discrete and narrative diagnostic observations and reports.

codeSystems.name: USCoreDocumentReferenceCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core DocumentReference Category
codeSystems.description: The US Core DocumentReferences Category Value Set is a 'starter set' of categories supported for fetching and storing clinical notes.

codeSystems.name: USCoreDocumentReferenceType
codeSystems.title: US Core DocumentReference Type
codeSystems.description: The US Core DocumentReference Type Value Set includes all LOINC values whose SCALE is "Doc" in the LOINC database and the HL7 v3 Code System NullFlavor concept 'unknown'

codeSystems.name: USCoreGoalCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Goal Codes
codeSystems.description: Concepts from SNOMED CT  and LOINC code systems that can be used to indicate the goal.

codeSystems.name: USCoreLaboratoryTestCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Laboratory Test Codes
codeSystems.description: Laboratory LOINC codes: From the introduction to August 2022 LOINC Users' guide; "The current scope of the existing laboratory portion of the LOINC  database includes all observations reported by clinical laboratories, including the specialty areas: chemistry, including therapeutic drug monitoring and toxicology; hematology; serology; blood bank; microbiology; cytology; surgical pathology; and fertility.

codeSystems.name: NarrativeStatus
codeSystems.title: US Core Narrative Status
codeSystems.description: The US Core Narrative Status Value Set limits the text status for the resource narrative.

codeSystems.name: USCoreObservationSmokingStatusStatus
codeSystems.title: US Core Status for Smoking Status Observation
codeSystems.description: Codes providing the status of an observation for smoking status. Constrained to `final`and `entered-in-error`.

codeSystems.name: USCoreProblemOrHealthConcern
codeSystems.title: US Core Problem or Health Concern
codeSystems.description: Code set for category codes for *US Core Condition Problems and Health Concerns Profile* consisting of the concepts "problem" and "health-concern".

codeSystems.name: USCoreProcedureCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Procedure Codes
codeSystems.description: Concepts from CPT, SNOMED CT, HCPCS Level II Alphanumeric Codes, ICD-10-PCS,CDT and LOINC code systems that can be used to indicate the type of procedure performed.

codeSystems.name: USCoreProvenancePaticipantTypeCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Provenance Participant Type Codes
codeSystems.description: The type of participation a provenance agent played for a given target.

codeSystems.name: USCoreScreeningAssessmentConditionCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Screening Assessment Condition Category
codeSystems.description: This value set consists of the single code "sdoh". It is the minimum value set of category codes used in the US Core Condition Problems and Health Concerns Profile that any conformant system **SHALL** support to help identify the type of USCDI Health Status/Assessment data class being reported.

codeSystems.name: USCoreScreeningAssessmentObservationCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Screening Assessment Observation Category
codeSystems.description: This value set is the minimum value set of category codes used in the US Core Observation Screening Assessment and Simple Observation Profiles that any conformant system **SHALL** support to help identify the type of USCDI Health Status/Assessment data class being reported.

codeSystems.name: USCoreScreeningAssessmentObservationMaximumCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Screening Assessment Observation Maximum Category
codeSystems.description: This value set is a value set of category codes used in the US Core Observation Screening Assessment that any conformant system **SHOULD** support to help identify the type of USCDI Health Status/Assessment data class being reported.

codeSystems.name: USCoreServiceRequestCategoryCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core ServiceRequest Category Codes
codeSystems.description: A set of SNOMED CT and LOINC concepts to classify a requested service

codeSystems.name: USCoreSimpleObservationCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Simple Observation Category
codeSystems.description: This value set is a value set of category codes used in the US Core Simple Observation and Condition Problems and Health Concerns Profiles that any conformant system **SHOULD** support to help identify the type of USCDI Health Status/Assessment data class being reported.

codeSystems.name: USCoreSpecimenCondition
codeSystems.title: US Core Specimen Condition
codeSystems.description: This value set contains concepts the provide information regarding a specimen, including the container, that does not meet a laboratory’s criteria for acceptability.
